ISSUE.TITLE: Backport SQLALCHEMY_ENABLE_POOL_PRE_PING to release 8.*
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi, it's possible to backport https://github.com/getredash/redash/pull/4741 from master to release 8.* and create a new release tag/docker hub image accordingly? This will fix the issue for users that rely on Helm chart ( https://github.com/getredash/contrib-helm-chart ) simply updating image tag on it.
